mapper.select: select status, count(*) numbers from book GROUP BY status

select book_id, category_id, book_name, book_describe, author, published, price, book_status, img, ebook, location, zan_number, score, input_time, update_time, borrowing_number, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4 from book where book_id in ( select DISTINCT record.book_id from record WHERE record.user_id in ( select user_id from `user` , user_class where user.class_id = user_class.class_id and depart_no = #{departNo} and user_id != #{userId} ) UNION select DISTINCT book_id from `comment`, comment_like WHERE `comment`.comment_id = comment_like.comment_id and comment_like.is_like = 1 and comment.user_id in ( select user_id from `user` , user_class where user.class_id = user_class.class_id and depart_no = #{departNo} and user_id != #{userId} ) UNION select DISTINCT book_id from user_collection WHERE user_collection.user_id in ( select user_id from `user` , user_class where user.class_id = user_class.class_id and depart_no = #{departNo} and user_id != #{userId}) ) ORDER BY zan_number desc, score desc

select book.book_id, category_id, book_name, book_describe, author, published, price, book_status, img, ebook, location, zan_number, score, input_time, update_time, borrowing_number, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, temp.total_browse from book, ( select record.book_id, count(*) as total_browse from record GROUP BY book_id ) as temp where book.book_id = temp.book_id and input_time > DATE_SUB(curdate(),INTERVAL 30 DAY)
ORDER BY total_browse desc , zan_number desc, score desc
